text:
<@U0260V1BX> and <@U0HP6TFNX> , We’ve been discussing what parameters to use on the home screen pattern and just wanted to check if there were any objections on two things from a UX point of view… 1) 360 minutes is the current cap for maxing out the pattern, and 2) 20 minutes worth of pattern (or 20 “points”) are added each time a user completes a Dx session. 

Any concerns around this?
